body_html:
Sorry, I meant version 10. CUDA filename is baked into the final executable, in order to change the CUDA version you have to recompile
…

body:
Sorry, I meant version 10.
CUDA filename is baked into the final executable, in order to change the
CUDA version you have to recompile

On Sun, Dec 18, 2016 at 5:53 PM, 史业民 <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> According to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r0.11/
> tensorflow/g3doc/get_started/os_setup.md, r0.11 also need CUDA 8.0 and
> CUDNN v5.
>
> —
